description: Chant the glory of the Sun.
name: chants

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 37, 49, 59, 67, 74 Physical Save and Spell Save and increasing your maximum life by 4.1%, 7.6%, 11%, 14%, 17% (Currently: 41, 75, 108, 138, 167).

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 13, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The saves and light damage will increase with your Spellpower and the life with talent level.
talents.name: Chant of Fortitude

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, reducing the damage enemies 3 or more spaces away deal by 12%, 17%, 21%, 25%, 27%.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 13, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The damage reduction will increase with talent level and light damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Fortress

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, granting you 12%, 16%, 20%, 23%, 25% resistance to all damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 13, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

You may only have one Chant active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Resistance

talents.info_text:
You chant the glory of the Sun, empowering your light and fire elemental attacks so that they do 26%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% additional damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of light, dealing 13, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage to anything that hits you in melee.

Your lite radius is also increased by 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

You may only have one Chant active at once and this Chant costs less power to sustain.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chant of Light

description: Bind the power of the Moon into circles at your feet.
name: circles

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 at your feet; the circle increases your Defense by 15, 20, 24, 27, 30, and deals 15, 21, 25, 28, 31 darkness damage per turn to everyone else with in its radius. The circle lasts 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Shifting Shadows

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 at your feet; the circle lights up affected tiles, increases your positive energy by 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 each turn, and deals 7.46, 9.99, 12, 14, 15 light damage and 7.46, 9.99, 12, 14, 15 fire damage per turn to everyone else within its radius. The circle lasts 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Blazing Light

talents.info_text: Creates a circle of radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 at your feet; the circle protects you from silence effects while you remain in its radius, and silences everyone else who enters. The circle lasts 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Circle of Sanctity

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 at your feet; the circle slows incoming projectiles by 50%, 67%, 80%, 91%, 101%, and attempts to push all creatures other then yourself out of its radius, inflicting 10, 13, 16, 18, 20 light damage and 10, 13, 16, 18, 20 darkness damage per turn as it does so. The circle lasts 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Warding

description: Your devotion allows you to combat your foes with indomitable determination.
name: combat

talents.info_text:
Infuse your weapon with the power of the Sun, adding 12, 28, 41, 51, 61 light damage on each melee hit.

Additionally, if you have a temporary damage shield active, melee attacks will increase its power by 5, 14, 20, 25, 30.

If the same shield is refreshed 20 times it will become unstable and explode, removing it.

The damage dealt and shield bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Weapon of Light

talents.info_text:
In a pure display of power, you project a ranged melee attack, doing 134%, 152%, 166%, 178%, 188% weapon damage.

If the target is outside of melee range, you have a chance to project a second attack against it for 50%, 69%, 86%, 101%, 114% weapon damage.

The second strike chance (which increases with distance) is 6.0%, 12%, 18%, 22%, 27% at range 2 and 27%, 43%, 53%, 60%, 65% at the maximum range of 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

The range will increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Wave of Power

talents.info_text:
Your weapon attacks burn with righteous fury, dealing -9%, 40%, 59%, 69%, 75% of your lost HP as additional Fire damage (up to 226, 303, 363, 413, 458, Current: 0).

Targets struck are also afflicted with a Martyrdom effect that causes them to take 3%, 9%, 14%, 18%, 21% of all damage they deal for 4 turns.
talents.name: Weapon of Wrath

talents.info_text: Any attack that would drop you below 1 hit point instead triggers Second Life, deactivating the talent, setting your hit points to 1, then healing you for 69, 147, 216, 279, 336.
talents.name: Second Life

talents.info_text: Fires out a bolt of cosmic energy in the target direction. The projectile continues until it hits a wall or the edge of the map, dealing 139, 186, 223, 254, 281 dark damage to enemies hit and restoring 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 negative energy. The negative energy gained is reduced by 25% per enemy hit, restoring a maximum of 20, 28, 32, 36, 40. Enemies hit will become aware of you.
talents.name: Lunar Orb

talents.info_text:
Fire an orb of negative energy towards a spot within range 3, 4, 5, 6, 6.

When the orb reaches its destination, it will teleport you to its location.

The speed of the projectile (200%, 258%, 308%, 344%, 372%) increases with your movement speed
talents.name: Astral Path

talents.info_text:
Sends out a slow-moving spiral of cosmic energy towards a target location within range 8.

As the cosmic energy moves, it pulls in targets adjacent to it, dealing 54, 72, 86, 98, 108 darkness damage and granting you 1 negative energy per hit.
talents.name: Galactic Pulse

talents.info_text:
Expend all of your negative energy to create a massive burst of dark energy (radius 1) at a target location within range 6.

This deals 72, 97, 116, 132, 146 darkness damage and pins targets hit for 2 turns.

The damage and pin chance increase with your spellpower, and the damage, radius and pin duration all increase with negative energy and talent level
talents.name: Supernova

description: Forgo your shield for the chance to crush your foes with a mighty two handed weapon.
name: crusader

talents.info_text:
You strike your foe with your two handed weapon, dealing 158%, 177%, 193%, 206%, 217% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, all foes in radius 2 will have their light resistance reduced by 4%, 7%, 10%, 13%, 16% and their damage reduced by 0%, 3%, 6%, 9%, 11% for 5 turns.
talents.name: Absorption Strike

talents.info_text: You mark a target with light for 5 turns, causing all melee hits you deal to it to heal you for 11%, 23%, 31%, 38%, 44% of the damage done.
talents.name: Mark of Light

talents.info_text:
While wielding a two handed weapon, your critical strike chance is increased by 2%, 4%, 5%, 7%, 8%, and your melee criticals instill you with righteous strength, increasing all physical and light damage you deal by 4%, 7%, 9%, 11%, 13%, stacking up to 3 times.

In addition, your melee critical strikes leave a lasting lightburn on the target, dealing 65, 87, 104, 118, 131 light damage over 5 turns and reducing opponents armour by 2, 10, 16, 20, 25.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Righteous Strength

talents.info_text:
Infuse your two handed weapon with light while spinning around.

All creatures in radius one take 82%, 95%, 105%, 114%, 121% weapon damage.

In addition while spinning your weapon shines so much it deals 78%, 97%, 113%, 126%, 137% light weapon damage to all foes in radius 2.

At level 4 your spinning blade creates a shield that blocks all damage for 1 turn.
talents.name: Flash of the Blade

description: The moment of the Eclipse is the moment of Truth, when Sun and Moon are in tandem and the energies of the world hang in the balance. Intense focus allows the greatest Anorithils to harness these energies to unleash devastating forces...
name: eclipse

talents.info_text: Increases your spell critical chance by 2%, 5%, 7%, 10%, 12%.
talents.name: Blood Red Moon

talents.info_text:
Increases your light and darkness resistance penetration by 19%, 29%, 38%, 44%, 49% for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns, and reduces the cooldown of all Celestial skills by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Totality

talents.info_text:
Each time one of your spells criticals, you project a bolt of light or shadow at up to 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 targets within radius 6, doing 37, 50, 59, 68, 75 light damage or 37, 50, 59, 68, 75 darkness damage per bolt.

This effect costs 2 positive or 2 negative energy each time it's triggered, and will not activate if either your positive or negative energy is below 2.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Corona

talents.info_text:
This powerful spell grants you 18, 23, 28, 31, 34 bonus invisibility, but converts 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 negative energy into positive energy each turn. Once your positive energy exceeds your negative energy, or you deactivate the talent, the effect ends in an explosion of light, converting all of your positive energy into damage and inflicting an additional 54, 72, 86, 98, 108 damage to everything in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality; all your damage is reduced by 50%.

You may not cast Twilight while this spell is active, and you should take off your light source; otherwise, others will spot you with ease.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Cunning, and the explosion damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Darkest Light

talents.info_text: Increases your movement speed by 0.04%, 0.13%, 0.20%, 0.26%, 0.32% per percent of positive energy and your casting speed by 0.04%, 0.13%, 0.20%, 0.26%, 0.32% per percent of negative energy, up to a maximum of 2.86%, 10%, 16%, 21%, 25% at 80%. Sustained energy still counts toward the maximum.
talents.name: Celestial Acceleration

talents.info_text: Whichever of your positive and negative energies is a higher percentage regenerates towards its max instead of its normal resting value (0 positive, 0 negative). Your negative and positive regeneration/degeneration rates are increased to 0.20, 0.39, 0.55, 0.70, 0.84.
talents.name: Polarization

talents.info_text: Swap your current positive and negative energy levels. This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: Magnetic Inversion

talents.info_text: Fires out a bolt of pure energy, dealing 151, 202, 241, 275, 304 light and 0.00 darkness damage in a radius of 1, and slowing targets hit. Their movement is reduced by 0% and attacking, casting and mind attacks by 25%, 30%, 30%, 30%, 30%. The bolt will attune to your current positive and negative energy amounts.
talents.name: Plasma Bolt

description: Bind the brilliant powers into glyphs to trap your foes.
name: glyphs

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will be dazed for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (24, 33, 41, 48, 53 detection and 29, 42, 51, 59, 67 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Glyph of Paralysis

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will be hit by a blast that knocks them back and does 29, 42, 52, 60, 67 physical damage.

The glyph is a hidden trap (24, 33, 41, 48, 53 detection and 29, 42, 51, 59, 67 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Glyph of Repulsion

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will trigger an explosion of light that does 29, 42, 52, 60, 67 damage to everyone within 1 tile.

The glyph is a hidden trap (24, 33, 41, 48, 53 detection and 24, 33, 41, 48, 53 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Glyph of Explosion

talents.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All targets walking over the glyph will be slowed by 25%, 31%, 36%, 42%, 48% for 5 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (29, 42, 51, 59, 67 detection and 29, 42, 51, 59, 67 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Glyph of Fatigue

description: Your devotion grants you additional protection.
name: guardian

talents.info_text:
Infuse your shield with light, healing you for 11, 15, 18, 20, 22 each time you take damage at the expense of up to 2 positive energy.

If you do not have any positive energy, the effect will not trigger.

Additionally, once per turn successful melee attacks will trigger a bonus attack with your shield dealing 38%, 49%, 58%, 66%, 72% light damage.

The healing done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shield of Light

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon doing 180%, 213%, 238%, 260%, 278% damage, and with a shield strike doing 140%, 156%, 169%, 180%, 189% damage. If the shield strike connects, your shield will explode in a burst of light that inflicts 110, 148, 177, 201, 223 light damage on all targets except yourself within radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 of the target, and light up all tiles in that radius.

The light damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Brandish

talents.info_text:
Retribution negates half of all damage you take while it is active. Once Retribution has negated 227, 304, 363, 414, 458 damage, your shield will explode in a burst of light, inflicting damage equal to the amount negated in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and deactivating the talent.

The amount absorbed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Retribution

talents.info_text:
You demonstrate your dedication to the light with a measured attack striking once with your weapon for 65%, 80%, 92%, 102%, 110% damage and once with your shield for 65%, 80%, 92%, 102%, 110% damage.

If the first strike connects 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 random talent cooldowns are reduced by 1.

If the second strike connects you are cleansed of 1 debuffs.
talents.name: Crusade

description: Chant the glory of the Moon.
name: hymns

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, empowering your dark elemental attacks so that they do 12%, 16%, 20%, 23%, 25% additional darkness damage.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 26, 35, 42, 48, 53 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Shadows

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, granting you infravision up to 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 grids, stealth detection (+7, +9, +11, +13, +15 power), and invisibility detection (+18, +24, +28, +32, +36 power).

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 13, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The stealth and invisibility detection, as well as the on-hit damage, will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Detection

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, granting you 19%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 45% stun, blindness and confusion resistance.

In addition, this talent surrounds you with a shield of shadows, dealing 26, 35, 42, 48, 53 darkness damage to anything that attacks you.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The on-hit damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Perseverance

talents.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moon, conjuring a shroud of dancing shadows that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a shadowy beam will hit up to 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 43, 57, 68, 78, 86 damage.

This powerful spell will drain 8.7, 6.4, 5.1, 4.2, 3.6 negative energy for each beam; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hymn of Moonlight

description: Invoke the power of the light to heal and mend.
name: light

talents.info_text:
An invigorating ray of Sunlight shines upon you, healing your body for 250, 335, 400, 456, 505 life.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Healing Light

talents.info_text:
A magical zone of Sunlight appears around you, healing and shielding all within a radius of 2 for 43, 57, 68, 78, 86 per turn and increasing healing effects on everyone within by 21%, 28%, 34%, 38%, 42%. The effect lasts for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns.

Existing damage shields will be added to instead of overwritten and have their duration set to 2 if it isn't higher.

If the same shield is refreshed 20 times it will become unstable and explode, removing it.

It also lights up the affected zone.

The amount healed will increase with the Magic stat
talents.name: Bathe in Light

talents.info_text:
A protective shield forms around you that lasts for up to 10 turns and negates 209, 280, 334, 381, 422 damage.

The total damage the barrier can absorb will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Barrier

talents.info_text:
Places you under the protection of Light itself. For 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns, the light heals 26, 34, 41, 47, 52 life and removes a single negative effect from you.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Providence

talents.info_text: Instantly travel to your jumpgate, as long as you are within 12, 14, 15, 16, 17 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate: Teleport To

talents.info_text: Create a second shadow jumpgate at your location. As long as you sustain this spell, you can use 'Jumpgate: Teleport' to instantly travel to the jumpgate, as long as you are within 12, 14, 15, 16, 17 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate Two

talents.info_text: Instantly travel to your second jumpgate, as long as you are within 12, 14, 15, 16, 17 tiles of it.
talents.name: Jumpgate Two: Teleport To

description: You channel the light of the sun through your body.
name: radiance

talents.info_text:
You are so infused with sunlight that your body glows permanently in radius 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, even in dark places.

Your vision adapts to this glow, giving you 16%, 42%, 55%, 64%, 70% blindness resistance.

The light radius overrides your normal light if it is bigger (it does not stack).
talents.name: Radiance

talents.info_text:
The light of your Radiance allows you to see that which would normally be unseen.

All enemies in your Radiance aura have their invisibility and stealth power reduced by 68, 86, 100, 112, 123.

In addition, all actors affected by illumination are easier to see and therefore hit; their defense is reduced by 23, 29, 33, 37, 41 and all evasion bonuses from being unseen are negated.

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Illumination

talents.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, doing up to 18, 24, 29, 33, 36 light damage (reduced with distance) to all foes caught inside.

At level 4 the light is so bright it has 3%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 17% chance to daze them for 3 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Searing Sight

talents.info_text: Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects dealing 20, 27, 33, 37, 41 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 81, 109, 130, 149, 165 light damage and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt. This powerful ability will dim your Radiance, reducing its radius to 1 for 5 turns.
talents.name: Judgement

talents.info_text: Create a distortion at the target tile, knocking back all projectiles and changing their direction to face away if possible.
talents.name: Diffraction Pulse

talents.info_text: Creates a wall 3 units long for 5, 8, 10, 12, 14 turns, reflecting all projectiles that hit it and blocking sight.
talents.name: Mirror Wall

talents.info_text: Target a projectile in mid-flight to clone it and target that projectile independently. You gain ownership over the new projectile.
talents.name: Spatial Prism

talents.info_text: Summons a clone for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns which casts all the spells you cast, dealing 33%, 53%, 64%, 71%, 75% damage and having 50% health. Additionally, all light damage the clone deals becomes darkness damage and all darkness damage becomes light damage.
talents.name: Mirror Self

talents.info_text: Fire out an orb of light that deals 76, 102, 122, 139, 154 light damage and then returns, dealing the same amount of damage again and reducing the cooldown by half (6, 5, 4, 4, 4) when it reaches you. The damage will increase with your spellpower. The ball will travel at most 28 distance to return to you.
talents.name: Solar Orb

talents.info_text: While sustained, this ability speeds up outgoing projectiles by 64%, 86%, 103%, 118%, 131% while slowing incoming projectiles by 28%, 31%, 33%, 35%, 36%. The increase and decrease improve with your spellpower
talents.name: Solar Wind

talents.info_text: After 5, 4, 3, 3, 3 turns, the target area in (radius 2) is blasted with a beam of light, dealing 168, 225, 269, 307, 340 damage and lighting the area
talents.name: Lucent Wrath

talents.info_text: Instantly gain 50%, 64%, 77%, 86%, 93% percent of a turn.
talents.name: Lightspeed

description: Call the fury of the Stars and the Moon to destroy your foes.
name: star fury

talents.info_text:
Focuses the power of the Moon into a beam of shadows, doing 128, 171, 204, 233, 258 damage.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Moonlight Ray

talents.info_text:
Invokes a blast of shadows that deals 59, 79, 95, 108, 120 darkness damage, and leaves a radius 3 field that does 21, 28, 33, 38, 42 darkness damage per turn for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shadow Blast

talents.info_text:
A surge of twilight pulses from you, doing 23, 47, 66, 81, 95 light and 23, 47, 66, 81, 95 darkness damage to all others within radius 2.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Twilight Surge

talents.info_text:
A star falls on a radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 area, doing 93, 125, 149, 170, 188 darkness damage on impact and stunning all within the area for 4 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Starfall

description: Summon the power of the Sun to burn your foes.
name: sun

talents.info_text:
Calls forth a ray of light from the Sun, doing 122, 163, 195, 222, 246 Light damage to the target.

At level 3 the ray will be so intense it will also blind the target and everyone in a radius 2 around it for 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sun Ray

talents.info_text:
A path of sunlight appears in front of you for 5 turns. All foes standing inside take 35, 47, 56, 64, 70 Light damage per turn.

While standing in the path, your movement takes no time and can not trigger traps.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Path of the Sun

talents.info_text:
Infuse yourself with the raging fury of the Sun, increasing your physical and spell critical chance by 1%, 3%, 5%, 6%, 8%.

Each time you crit with a physical attack or a spell you have 23%, 44%, 57%, 64%, 70% chance to gain Sun's Vengeance for 2 turns.

While affected by Sun's Vengeance, your Sun Ray will take no time to use and will deal 25% more damage.

If Sun Ray was on cooldown, the remaining turns are reduced by one instead.

This effect can only happen once per turn.
talents.name: Sun's Vengeance

talents.info_text:
You wrap yourself in a cloak of sunlight that empowers your magic and protects you for 6 turns.

While the cloak is active, your spell casting speed is increased by 17%, 23%, 27%, 31%, 34%, your spell cooldowns are reduced by 31%, 34%, 36%, 38%, 38%, and you cannot take more than 91%, 85%, 81%, 77%, 73% of your maximum life from a single blow.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Suncloak

description: Summon the power of the Sun to burn your foes.
name: sunlight

talents.info_text:
Calls the power of the Sun into a searing lance, doing 87, 117, 140, 159, 177 damage to the target and leaving a spot on the ground for 4 turns that does 43, 57, 68, 78, 86 light damage to anyone within it.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Searing Light

talents.info_text:
Invokes the Sun to cause a flare within radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, blinding your foes for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns and lighting up your immediate area (radius 4, 4, 6, 6, 8).

At level 3 it will also do 43, 57, 68, 78, 86 light damage within radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sun Flare

talents.info_text:
Call forth the Sun to summon a fiery beam, burning all targets in a line for 110, 148, 177, 201, 223 fire damage.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Firebeam

talents.info_text:
Conjures a furious burst of Sunlight, dealing 87, 117, 140, 159, 177 light damage to all around you in a radius of 3.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sunburst

description: Stand between the darkness and the light, harnessing both.
name: twilight

talents.info_text:
You stand between the darkness and the light, allowing you to convert 15 positive energy into 64, 102, 135, 164, 190 negative energy.

Learning this talent will change the default level of positive and negative energies to 19%, 24%, 27%, 30%, 32% of their maximum. Each turn, the energies will slowly fall/rise to this value, instead of 0.

The negative energy gain will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Twilight

talents.info_text:
Create a shadow jumpgate at your current location. As long as you sustain this spell, you can use 'Jumpgate: Teleport' to instantly travel to the jumpgate, as long as you are within 12, 14, 15, 16, 17 tiles of it.

Note that any stairs underneath the jumpgate will be unusable while the spell is sustained, and you may need to cancel this sustain in order to leave certain locations.

At talent level 4, you learn to create and sustain a second jumpgate.
talents.name: Jumpgate

talents.info_text:
Let out a mental cry that shatters the will of your targets within radius 3, confusing (10%, 25%, 33%, 38%, 42% to act randomly) them for 9, 10, 10, 11, 11 turns.

The duration will improve with your Cunning.
talents.name: Mind Blast

talents.info_text:
Creates a shadowy copy of a hostile target of up to medium, medium, big, big, huge size. The copy will attack its progenitor immediately and lasts for 15, 16, 16, 17, 17 turns.

The duplicate has 20%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 44% of the target's life, 20%, 28%, 34%, 40%, 44% all damage resistance, +50% darkness resistance and -50% light resistance.

The duration, life and all damage resistance scale with your Cunning and this ability will not work on bosses.
talents.name: Shadow Simulacrum

talents.info_text: Fire out a spear of cosmic energies. If it hits an enemy it deals 190, 255, 305, 347, 384 damage, otherwise it explodes in a thin cone of radius 4 at the end of its range, blocked by enemies, which deals 76, 102, 122, 139, 154 to 190, 255, 305, 347, 384 damage depending on how much the enemies block.
talents.name: Nebula Spear

talents.info_text: Fires out a projectile in a clockwise arc. If it hits an enemy it deals %0.2f damage and roots them for one turn. If another projectile damages them within %d turns, they take half that damage and are rooted again.
talents.name: Crescent Wave

talents.info_text:
The target feels the echoes of all your light and dark damage for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

Light damage slows the target by 0.10% per point of damage dealt for 3 turns, up to a maximum of 22%, 30%, 36%, 41%, 45% at 226, 303, 363, 413, 458 damage.

Dark damage creates an effect at the tile for 3 turns which deals 6%, 9%, 10%, 12%, 13% of the damage dealt each turn. It will be refreshed as long as the target continues taking damage from it or another source while Twilit Echoes is active, dealing its remaining damage over the new duration as well as the new damage.
talents.name: Twilit Echoes

talents.info_text: Summons the starscape in the surrounding area in a radius of 8. For 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns, this area exists outside normal time, and in zero gravity. In addition to the effects of zero gravity, Movement of projectiles and other creatures is three times as slow. Spells and attacks cannot escape the radius until the effect ends.
talents.name: Starscape
